title: The Knock at the Door
description: In this Dateline classic, the case of a young woman found murdered turns cold soon after she is found. Will her mother’s search for answers bring justice? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 7, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
